Uses of Package
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

Packages that use co.cask.cdap.api.dataset
co.cask.cdap.api.app An Application is a logical grouping of Streams, Datasets, Flows, Procedures, and other deployable elements. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset Defines APIs for accessing and managing data within CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.lib Collection of Dataset implementations available out-of-the-box in CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.module Defines deployment of custom Datasets to make them available within CDAP. 
co.cask.cdap.api.dataset.table Provides access to the system-level table Datasets available within CDAP. 
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset used by co.cask.cdap.api.app
Dataset
          Implementations of this class perform data operations on dataset instance.
DatasetProperties
          Dataset instance properties.
 

Classes in co.cask.cdap.api.dataset used by co.cask.cdap.api.dataset
Dataset
          Implementations of this class perform data operations on dataset instance.
DatasetAdmin
          Defines the minimum administrative operations a dataset should support.
DatasetProperties
          Dataset instance properties.
DatasetProperties.Builder
          A Builder to construct DatasetSpecification instances.
DatasetSpecification
          A DatasetSpecification is a hierarchical meta data object that contains all meta data needed to instantiate a dataset at runtime.
DatasetSpecification.Builder
          A Builder to construct DataSetSpecification instances.

          Defines named dataset type implementation.

          Dataset instance properties.
DatasetSpecification
          A DatasetSpecification is a hierarchical meta data object that contains all meta data needed to instantiate a dataset at runtime.
